page.title: 10RECREATION IN FERNESS
page.content:
In the winter months indoor bowling is a favourite pastime of the locals. Apart from the weekly practices, competitions within the club and in a local league are held in the Community Hall. Special functions take place in the hall such as concerts, talks or occasionally dances.
There are also regular meetings of the Women's Guild, Women's Rural, Badminton Club and the Rifle Club ( held in the purpose-built rifle range attached to the hall.)
The nearest cinemas and theatres are ten to twenty-five miles away.
There are no local Brownie or Cub packs but some parents take children to Forres to attend Cubs.
